component.name: ThemedRowListLabel
component.script:
Sub Init()
m.top.vertAlign="center" m.top.horizAlign="center" m.top.observeField("itemContent", "OnItemContent_Changed") m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnGlobal_ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnItemContent_Changed()
itemContent = m.top.itemContent if itemContent <> invalid then m.top.text = itemContent.title m.top.width = itemContent.fhdItemWidth OnGlobal_ThemeChanged() end if
End Sub
Sub OnGlobal_ThemeChanged()
m.top.color = m.global.theme.textOnBackground
End Sub
